item.title: How to create Tanaka contours
item.description: Tanaka contours aka illuminated contours is terrain visualization method developed first by Prof. Tanaka Kitirito in 1950. The mimics 3D by illuminating the northwestern slopes and shading the opposite slopes. I followed Anita Graser’s tutorial to create Tanaka contours and updated it a bit as QGIS has evolved since then. Her tutorial was inspired by Hannes Kr√∂ger’s attempt to create the effect using QGIS. You need a DEM for creating Tanaka contoours.
